trans-unit.source: Represents a query against a specified table.
trans-unit.target: Represents a query against a specified table.

trans-unit.source: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> instance aggregates the query parameters to use when the query is executed.
trans-unit.target: A <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery</codeEntityReference> instance aggregates the query parameters to use when the query is executed.

trans-unit.source: One of the <codeInline>executeQuery</codeInline> or <codeInline>executeQuerySegmented</codeInline> methods of <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTableClient</codeEntityReference> must be called to execute the query.
trans-unit.target: One of the <codeInline>executeQuery</codeInline> or <codeInline>executeQuerySegmented</codeInline> methods of <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTableClient</codeEntityReference> must be called to execute the query.

trans-unit.source: The parameters are encoded and passed to the server when the table query is executed.
trans-unit.target: The parameters are encoded and passed to the server when the table query is executed.
